item.description: This movie will be hosted by Susan. Since Nicole's hosting of this movie on Friday April 20 is full, I am planning another time for people to see it. I called Coolidge Theatre and was told that it would probably be playing for a few weeks. They decide on a week-to-week basis if they'll continue running a film, so we won't know for sure until the week before. If it's not here, perhaps it will play somewhere else in the area. I will keep you informed. I'm listing the same time it's showing on April 20 which could change.
item.name: Back by popular demand - "Black Book"
